Thought Journal How\'d I get Here? Pros and Cons Bad Behaviors Identify Barriers ABC\'s
Pros and cons icon How\'d I get here icon Bad behaviors icon ABC\'s icon Thought journal icon Identify barriers icon
Thought journals can help you recognize and change unhelpful thought patterns. The purpose of this exercise is to get you into the habit of paying attention to your thoughts. The ABC\'s stand for Activating events, Beliefs, and Conequences. The purpose of this activity to recognize the link between the things that happen to us, unhelpful beliefs/thoughts, and the consequences of these thoughts and events. Already identified the unhelpful behavior you\'dlike to change? In this activity we will problem solveâ€¦ and try to prevent the behavior next time an urge pops up! This activity can help you analyze the chain of events and reactions that contributed to a behavior step by step. So we can prevent it next time. What about good/effective bahaviors? When there was a helpful behavior or action that we planned to do but didn\'t, this activity can helps identify what stopped us from doing it. This activity can help you look at things objectively by weighing the pros and cons of continuing or stopping engagement in a specific thought, behavior, or habit.>
Send us a suggestion Have an idea for an activity you think would be helpful?
Begin!
